author: Kelly Fisher
title: Watch: Pregnant Lauren Alaina Opens Up About Expecting Her First Baby | New Country 107.9 YYD
text:
Lauren Alaina opened up about her pregnancy when she caught up with Kelly Clarkson on a new episode of The Kelly Clarkson Show on Thursday (January 23).
Alainaâ€™s appearance on the talk show takes place one day after her surprise pregnancy announcement . The Georgia-born country star debuted her growing baby bump for the first time as she released her newest single, â€œThose Kind Of Women,â€ and its heartfelt music video on Wednesday (January 22). The video ends with a dedication to â€œmy Momma and our sweet Baby Arnold coming summer 2025.â€
Alaina, who married husband Cam Arnold in February 2024, said sheâ€™s â€œ22 weeks (along)â€¦which is a long time to hide a pregnancy, by the way. Iâ€™m very excited for people to know about this.â€ She added in an Instagram post on Thursday that she and her husband â€œare overwhelmed with the love we have received for sweet Baby Arnold. Our baby is so loved already. Thank you for all the well wishes for our growing familyðŸ¼â€
â€œThe song is called â€˜ Those Kind Of Women ,â€™ and itâ€™s all about the women who raised me,â€ Alaina said later when Clarkson asked about the sweet song and the surprise pregnancy announcement in the music video. â€œAnd this song means so much to me already, and then I recorded the song and mastered the song, and when I was getting the master back, I had found out that I was pregnant and no one knew except me and my husband. And Iâ€™m sobbing listening to the song. And I will say, my mom and I have always been very close, but it has changed. Oh my goodness, Iâ€™m so pregnant, Iâ€™m gonna cry about it,â€ Alaina paused as she began to feel emotional. â€œItâ€™s the best thing Iâ€™ve ever done.â€
Alaina is one of several country artists expecting a baby in 2025, along with a few other first-time parents. Most recently, Shay Mooney of Dan + Shay welcomed Baby No. 4 with wife Hannah Mooney . Days earlier, rising country star Sarahbeth Taite announced Baby No. 2â€™s arrival . Other artists welcoming a baby into the family this year include HARDY , Elle King , Sam Hunt and more. See the pregnancy announcements here .
